item.description:
Lets grab a quick bite to eat before seeing the movie.....

The plan is to meet at 11:45 to give us enough time to eat before the 2:30 showing of Watchmen (see other event) begins...

I am hoping to make reservations but if there is a problem I will let you know so look out for changes in details.

Hope to see you there.....
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet right inside the front door.
item.name: Lunch at Fudruckers
